title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 383: Featuring Wayne Gretzky
description:
On Episode 383 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Wayne Gretzky. The Great One joined (56:46) to discuss his father, working with Biz at TNT and almost becoming a member of the Detroit Red Wings plus tons more. But first, the guys open the show and discuss Grinnelli’s trek around Manhattan, the recent Sandbagger, and some Chiclets Cup news. The guys also preview two potential playoff series, Edmonton vs LA and St. Louis vs Minnesota. The boys wrap up the show talking Guy Lafleur, Mike Tyson and what Grinds RA’s Gears.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
